Luosto is a ski and safari resort in the heart of the national forest that specialises in authentic and uncommercialised Husky, Reindeer, Skidoo and Santa excursions. 

With a wonderful choice of hotels or rustic log cabin accommodation this is a serene resort in the heart of Finnish Lapland.'''

Equidistant from both Rovaniemi and Kittila airports a short connection from Helsinki is ideal. From here ski buses, taxis or private transfers are available. 

Alternatively if travelling from the UK some direct charters operate to assist in the "Search for Santa" during the peak Christmas season. For more information on these flights you can contact Canterbury Travel, the Santa specialists "

Travelling to Rovaniemi from southern Finland (10-12 hours) is easy,also with a car-carrier train. There are bus connections from railway station to Luosto (SkiBus),which leave immediately following the arrival of the train.

There is Luosto’s own SkiBus that transports holidaymakers to the area year round. During high season the bus drives four times a day and during lower season once a day.Pyhä-Luosto SkiBus is a connection to certain Finnair and Blue1 flights and the timetable may chance accordingly.

Luostos Main attractions are it's Reindeer, Husky, Santa and Skidoo activities.

This classical music event breaks all boundaries in bringing the finest artistic experiences to the fells of Finnish Lapland. The heavens alone provide the roof and great old pine trees form the walls of Ukko-Luosto concert hall, which seats 2,000 with plenty of space besides for those who would simply lie in the heather. Other concert places are as extraordinary. Aittakuru is a deep ravine formed by an ancient glacial river. The stage is on the bottom near a small pond. The audience sits tens of meters above. Ahvenlampi is a scenic lake whose glimmering surface offers the acoustics and whose high banks are excellent for the audience.

The atmospheric Log Restaurant and

is located in the centre of Luosto resort. Hovi is a traditional log cabin restaurant catering to all tastes with an a la carte and Gasto Pub menu. It offers the best of live bands and regular events.

Available for private hire, LuostonHovi may be used for small conferences, private functions or celebrations with appropriate entertainment provided as desired.

LuostonHovi also caters to Luosto resort cabins.
Gastro Pub

is located in the centre of Luosto resort and offers a wide selection of drinks. A Lappish favourite Salmiakki Koskenkorva is of course served (a licquorice based Vodka) along side a selective but thorough wine list.
There is a wide choice of

value: log cabins, luxury villas and  lodge log cabin

accommodation in Luosto. Many prefer these for their private saunas, open wood burning fires and the occaisional steam shower.

Staying in these cabins can also be beneficial due to their proximity to certain activities. Some Villas for example are ski in ski out, and others such as Tallero are close to the Luoston Hovi.


Alternatively you can stay in one of two hotels the Luostotunturi Hotel or the Aurora Chalet.
